it.polimi.se2018.model.cards

Interface Card

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    PrivateObjectiveCard, PublicObjectiveCard, ToolCard

    public interface Card
extends java.lang.Cloneable
    Interface Card This interfaces manages the creation of all types of card that are used in the game
    Author:
    Davide Lorenzi

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addFavMarkers(int favMarkersNumber)
      Favour Marker Adder This Method virtually sets 1 or 2 Favour Markers on a ToolCard

      Clone Card Method This method creates a clone of a Card

      Description Getter This method is used to acquire the description of a Card

      Card Shower This method prints all the features of the selected Card

        Type Getter This method is used to acquire the type of a Card

      • getColor

        java.lang.String getColor()
        DieColor Getter This method is used to acquire the color of the die of PrivateObjectiveCard or ToolCard
        Returns:
        the colour of the die to enable the correct score counter or to enable the chosen ToolCard in SinglePlayer mode

      • getPrice

        int getPrice()
        Price Getter This method is used to acquire the price of a ToolCard
        Returns:
        the price of the chosen ToolCard

      • addFavMarkers

        void addFavMarkers(int favMarkersNumber)
        Favour Marker Adder This Method virtually sets 1 or 2 Favour Markers on a ToolCard
        Parameters:
        favMarkersNumber - Number of favourite markers to add

      • getPublicVictoryPoint

        int getPublicVictoryPoint()
        PublicVictoryPoints Getter This method is used to acquire the number of victory points of a PublicObjectiveCard
        Returns:
        the number of Victory Points of the chosen PublicObjectiveCard

      • clone

        Card clone()
    throws java.lang.CloneNotSupportedException
        Clone Card Method This method creates a clone of a Card
        Returns:
        a new ToolCard build by the random chosen one read from the JSON file
        Throws:
        java.lang.CloneNotSupportedException - if is impossible to create the clone
